meanings.sent1: My grandmama makes the best cookies.
meanings.sent2: I visited my grandmama over the weekend.
meanings.sent3: Grandmama always tells the funniest stories.
meanings.sent4: The roots of our family tree are held together by our grandmama.
meanings.sent5: Every holiday, grandmama's house is filled with love and laughter.

meanings.definition: A term of endearment for an elderly woman.
meanings.sent1: I love spending time with my grandmama.
meanings.sent2: She is everyone's favorite grandmama in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: Grandmama's garden is the envy of the town.
meanings.sent4: Her wisdom and kindness make her the grandmama of the community.
meanings.sent5: The children always run to grandmama for hugs and treats.
